content.rendered:
Lead Qualification Tools from TeleDirect

We qualify your leads through our cost-effective and conversion-based B2B lead qualification services. By immediately sending your sales team qualified and vetted leads, we'll help convert inquiries into sales, and prospects into customers. Timing is everything: Let TeleDirect help you devise a strategy to keep your sales funnel moving along as efficiently as we are.

If your lead qualification funneling process needs improved, or your sales figures have recently slipped, TeleDirect’s lead qualification offers flexible, scalable call center platform tools. Thanks to intuitive, actionable sales lead qualification resources, we’ll help your enterprise capture valuable opportunities at the most opportune time – when your customers and clients are in contact!

Optimal Lead Qualification Funnel Advantages

  • Increase sales and conversions
  • Reduce inactive leads
  • Reduce cost per sale
  • Increase return on investment
  • No outbound cold calling to consumers
  • Professionally trained agents

Keep Your Sales Funnel Moving with our Cutting-Edge Lead Qualification Tools!

With considerable, real-world experience helping clients in all industries prequalify and verify their leads, our lead qualification call center allows your sales team to do what they do best: convert prospects into customers. Achieve higher closing ratios while reducing the cost of each sale with us. Free up your other resources to concentrate on other business-critical tasks; let us improve your lead qualification funnel process. We've become an industry leader in lead qualification services and can immediately implement a comprehensive sales conversion strategy for your business. The process of converting potential clients to repeat customers all starts with the ultimate inbound call center solution and lead qualification tools: TeleDirect’s lead qualification services!

Keep Your Sales Funnel Moving

With over 350 agents staffing our U.S. based call center and 25 years of experience helping clients in all industries prequalify and verify their leads, our lead qualification call center allows your sales team to do what they do best: convert prospects into customers. Achieve higher closing ratios while reducing the cost of each sale with us. We've become an industry leader in lead qualification services and can immediately implement a comprehensive sales conversion strategy for your business.

Get more info

Higher Conversions

Our clients have enjoyed proven success with our lead qualification services. Through immediate contact and communication with your sales channel leads, conversion rates increase as these warm leads are instantly qualified based on your specific requirements. Sales funnel conversions continue since we ensure an immediate transfer or schedule for a follow-up call for your team. To see how TeleDirect’s sales lead qualification capability can bolster your call center services and positively impact your bottom line, call us at (800) 776-1081 or fill out our customer contact form. Within minutes, we’ll help you devise a better game plan to capture your customers’ attention. And it all starts with our proven lead qualification.

Get more info

24/7 Communication

Sales is not a 9 to 5 business. It’s a 24/7 enterprise. Are your lead qualification tools robust and agile enough to keep up?  Maximize your sales conversions at any time of the day from all your sales channels such as TV, online and print advertising. Our lead qualification services immediately capture your prospects while they are interested. Increase your return on investment with TeleDirect, a proven profit center partner, not a cost center vendor.

Business never stops – even when your personnel go home for the evening. With 24/7 call center functionality, TeleDirect’s BPO call center includes exceptional lead qualification services. Because potential customers simply don’t operate on a typical weekday, daylight schedule. Find additional customers. Leverage unseen opportunities. Optimize your brand’s influence with TeleDirect’s lead qualification tools and processes.

Get more info

Agent Experience

TeleDirect's knowledgeable and professional Agents are a true extension of your company to help reach and surpass your lead conversion goals. Our agents are constantly evaluated and rewarded through their call performance, without a commission-based structure to focus on high quality and customer engagement. With our bilingual and U.S.-only based staff handling your lead qualification tools across multiple channels, find out why our lead qualification services are unparalleled nationwide. TeleDirect offers two-tier inbound call center solutions, in terms of customer contact: intuitive, automated software and top-trained live agents. When your enterprise’s communication demands that personal attention to detail, customize our inbound call center service for maximum efficiency and great proven results.

Get more info

TeleDirect Advantages: Lead Qualification Tools, Lead Qualification Funneling & More

Active sales funnels. Professional agent expertise. Round the clock support. And better bottom-line results…TeleDirect’s lead qualification strategies encompass the entire spectrum of smart, sales-friendly tools. Whether you need a master lead qualification checklist or increased activity on your front-line sales platform, TeleDirect offers the flexibility and customization of a true business process outsourcing (BPO) solution.

 

Here are just a few ways TeleDirect gives you the edge with world-class BPO lead qualification:

 

Increase sales and conversions. With lead qualification strategies, it’s all about timing. TeleDirect’s proven lead qualification process helps you maximize sales possibilities, all while minimizing risk with your inbound call center.

Reduce inactive leads. Don’t spend time chasing leads that aren’t going anywhere – start focusing on potential clients. With our lead qualification tools, you’ll increase efficiency, expand sales opportunities, and help grow your bottom line.

Lead qualification checklists. TeleDirect’s versatile lead qualification services include a bird’s-eye view of your current sales landscape, so you can easily create a lead qualification checklist to focus on tangible, timely actions to produce superior results. Before you can close the deal, you need a lead qualification program that gives you a chance to succeed. That’s what our lead qualification services are all about!

Create next-level inbound call center services for your customers. The more you know about your potential and long-term customers, the better you’re able to provide exceptional customer service. With our lead qualification services, you’re already ahead of the game. See how enhanced lead qualification with your inbound call center solution leads to lifetime relationships!

Reduce cost per sale and boost ROI How much money are you spending on sales? TeleDirect’s focused, client-first approach eliminates the fluff and provides sales collateral whenever your clients need it. As a result, you’ll enjoy minimal costs - and optimal return on investment with paying clients! This ultimately increases ROI. Ideally, you’d like to invest as little time as possible – and enjoy outsized yields, whether you’re talking about improved customer satisfaction rates or your revenue. TeleDirect’s business process outsourcing (BPO) call center lead qualification process sets in motion a practical, achievable process to optimize ROI. The bottom line? Your bottom line will improve.

Efficient outbound calling. When it comes to creating and developing leads, one of the most important lead qualification tools is cold calling. TeleDirect specializes in B2B outbound cold calling. With TeleDirect’s proven call center platform in your corner, lead qualification isn’t about calls out of the blue. It’s about keeping your numbers in the black – because our entire call center services are built around this premise: improving your customer service and growing profit margins. With our B2B consulting and lead qualification services, we can work with you on sales strategies and other marketing concepts that may boost sales. Contact us today and see how we can help!

Contact TeleDirect Today for Innovative Sales Lead Qualification Tools & Lead Qualification Services

Get a quote now, or call our lead qualification experts and inbound call center consultants directly at (800) 776-1081. But don’t wait – your competition is already looking at ways to improve their own lead qualification strategies. Keep your edge – and grow your advantage – with TeleDirect!

Contact TeleDirect Today for Lead Qualification Checklists, Innovative Sales Lead Qualification & More

Get a quote now, or call our lead qualification experts and inbound call center consultants directly at (800) 776-1081. But don’t wait – your competition is already looking at ways to improve their own lead qualification services and sales strategy. Keep your edge – and grow your advantage – with TeleDirect!

 

Contact TeleDirect Today for Innovative Sales Lead Qualification

Get a quote now, or call our lead qualification experts and inbound call center consultants directly at (800) 776-1081. But don’t wait – your competition is already looking at ways to improve their own sales tactics. Keep your edge – and grow your advantage – with TeleDirect!
